item.title: Sydney Christmas fuel prices to hit cheapest level since pandemic
item.description: <p>By early next week, unleaded is expected to fall to around $1.60, which is 20 cents per litre cheaper than the same time last year.</p>

item.title: Sea World pilot 'used cocaine' day before crash tragedy
item.description: <p>A helicopter pilot involved in one of Australia&#x27;s worst air disasters was seen taking cocaine at a party a day before the fatal crash, a coroner has heard</p>

item.title: Australia's oldest World War II veteran celebrates 108th birthday
item.description: <p>The veteran served as a signaller during the war and was also a part-time photographer, forced to trade cigarette rations for materials to develop his photographs.</p>
